entry.title: Standardizing OP_RETURN message format
entry.summary: In an email conversation on April 6th, 2014, Maciej Trebacz discussed a method of destroying coins through a Proof of Burn transaction. This involves sending all the coins as fees to miners, effectively removing them from circulation. However, for those who only require a dummy output for an all fee transaction, there is no need for a PUSH at all.
